keywords: Always on My Mind, Pet Shop Boys, John L. Christopher,Mark James,Wayne Carson, Covers, Cover Songs, Samples, Tributes, Music
title: Always on My Mind
description: Always on My Mind by Pet Shop Boys was written by John L. Christopher, Mark James, Wayne Carson and was first recorded by Brenda Lee in 1971. It was first released by Gwen McCrae in 1972. Pet Shop Boys released it on the audio single Always on My Mind in 1987. It was also covered by Elvis Presley, Willie Nelson, El Viz and 35 others.
